name: ziggeo-client-sdk
description: Ziggeo API (https://ziggeo.com) allows you to integrate video recording and playback with only two lines of code in your site, service or app. This is the JavaScript Client SDK.
author: Ziggeo

scripts.relink: npm link betajs-scoped && npm link betajs-compile && npm link betajs && npm link betajs-browser && npm link betajs-dynamics && npm link betajs-shims && npm link betajs-media && npm link betajs-media-components
scripts.reinstall: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run relink
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -a -m Auto-Deploy && git push origin master && npm publish && npm run pushtags
